Subject: RSO UAE - Store Closure (Renovation) - Guess – The Outlet Village - 20th July 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Team,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

As per our minutes of meeting for renovation plan of “Guess – The Outlet Village”.

 

The location will be temporary closed and last trading date is 20th July 2025, Handover to Project team on 22nd July 2025.

The boutique is expected to re-open for business on October 2025 (date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Abdelrahman <mailto:Abdelrahman.Hafez@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 22nd July, Service request #SR-1389256 @Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com> 

*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 20th July at the EOD @Abdelrahman <mailto:Abdelrahman.Hafez@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 21st July 2025 / Ensure freeze of the Cash Collection Service Agreement till Oct 2025 @Ghouse <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 22nd Jul to be install in new external storage room if possible @Rawad <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  to Hold services (cleaning – pest control) till opening.

Subject: RSO UAE - Store Closure (Renovation) - Guess – The Outlet Village - 20th July 2025 

 

Dear Team,

 

Hope you are doing well,

 

As per our minutes of meeting for renovation plan of “Guess – The Outlet Village”.

 

The location will be temporary closed and last trading date is 20th July 2025, Handover to Project team on 22nd July 2025.

The boutique is expected to re-open for business on October 2025 (date TBC).

 

To ensure a smooth closure, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time.

 

*	Apply for Mall and Police permits (Merchandise, Non-Merchandise transfer (Store team and logistic) / IT Equipment, Traffic counter, and CCTV Dismantling) @Abdelrahman <mailto:Abdelrahman.Hafez@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT Equipment dismantling on 22nd July, Service request #SR-1389256 @Rizaldy <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com> 
*	Deposit Petty cash & Cash Float in separate deposit bags and EOD cash in a different one on 20th July at the EOD @Abdelrahman <mailto:Abdelrahman.Hafez@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange TG team to collect the Cash Deposit on 21st July 2025 / Ensure freeze of the Cash Collection Service Agreement till Oct 2025 @Ghouse <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com> 
*	Please arrange Sefa team to dismantle the NVR and CCTV on 22nd Jul to be install in new external storage room if possible @Rawad <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com> 
*	@Maitha <mailto:Maitha.Alhashmi@chalhoub.com>  @Pierre <mailto:Pierre.Baasolo@chalhoub.com>  to Hold services (cleaning – pest control) till opening.
